```{r echo = F}
library(dplyr)
library(DT)
d <- read.csv("kaken2019.csv", encoding = "UTF-8")
```

```{r}
d2 <- d %>% select(研究機関, 総配分額) %>%
  mutate(総配分額 = as.numeric(総配分額)) %>%
  group_by(研究機関) %>%
  summarize(N = n(), Total = sum(総配分額)) %>%
  ungroup %>%
  mutate(Share = Total/sum(Total, na.rm = T) * 100) %>%
  arrange(desc(Share))
datatable(d2)
```
